content: 📌Exchange now with the lowest 0.35% Float rate on Bitsar! No KYC is required to exchange! The instant exchange function on the homepage does not require an account. You can directly trade the currency you want, and the system automatically trades 24 hours a day. You may visit our site www.bitsar.com1. When you choose a Fixed rate, the exact transaction price will be displayed.✅You only have to pay 1% + network fee.✅No hidden commissions.✅Freeze interest rates for 10 minutes.2. When you choose a Floating rate, the exchange rate is finally confirmed when the block network confirms after you complete the transfer. You will receive more tokens when the market rises. And you will receive fewer tokens if it decreases, which is fair.✅You only need to pay 0.35% + the network fee.✅No hidden commissions.✅The exchange rate will be confirmed when we receive your transaction.Contact Information:📍Email: cs@bitsar.com📍Facebook: https://web.facebook.com/bitsarexchange/📍Twitter: https://twitter.com/Bitsar_Exchange📍Telegram: https://t.me/Bitsarexchange
